segments.text: What does it cost to ride this bus ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you been driving buses a long time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I haven't been driving for long â€” only for a few months .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you like to drive the bus ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would have never dreamed of ever becoming a bus driver .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I never dreamed of doing this either . The only thing I like about it is the money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was really fun chatting with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was really nice talking to you too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll have a good day once this day is over .
segments.speaker: S2
